generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible cobblestone texture and road markings, including white dashed lines, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: The area to the right of the road, separated by black posts and bordered by trees, is a designated pedestrian area with a raised edge, consistent with a sidewalk.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible in the background and on the sides of the road, including multi-story structures with windows and commercial signage.
- vegetation: Trees with green and some autumn-colored leaves are visible throughout the scene, lining the streets and sidewalks.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast and white.
- person: Several individuals are visible walking on the sidewalk and crossing the street, including one person in a red jacket and another in a dark jacket.
- car: Multiple cars are visible on the road, including a black car directly ahead and a silver car further ahead.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible at the intersection, showing a green light.
- traffic sign: A triangular warning sign (yield sign) is visible on a pole above the road, and other traffic signs are mounted on poles along the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible throughout the scene, including those supporting traffic lights and signs, as well as black posts along the sidewalk.
- bicycle: Several bicycles are parked on the sidewalk, secured to black posts.
